    • Constructor Detail

      • Destruction

        public Destruction(java.lang.String name,
           int speed,
           int damage)
        It is an effect which allows a warrior to attack an other warrior. This constructor create a Destruction object with a name, a speed and damage. The object will be created as constants, which can be choice by the player.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the damage effect
        speed - the speed of the effect
        damage - the damage are use to construct the effect
